At this stage we don’t have a formal waitlist that guarantees an offer, but we do keep note of families who have expressed sustained interest and can confirm quickly if an opening arises. The most helpful things you can do are: (1) remain available to respond promptly if we contact you, and (2) ensure your application details and required documents are complete and up to date (e.g., child details, start-date availability, and any standard identification/registration paperwork required by the allocation process).

If your circumstances change (for example, you can start earlier/later or have additional flexibility), feel free to message us again with those specifics, as it can help us if a place opens unexpectedly.

Thank you again for your patience and understanding.
